preconditions.precondition: Student needs to have access to exams

successEndConditions.condition: Student completes exam and receives feedback

failureEndConditions.condition: Student does not complete exam successfully

mainSequence.step: List of available exams is displayed
Student selects an exam to take
Validation is performed to check if the exam is open for submission
If exam is open for submission, the exam is prepared for the student
Student answers questions in the exam
Exam grade is calculated based on the percentage of correct answers
Feedback is provided to the student
